task.title: Add the Silverlight Media Module to a Project
task.shortdesc: The Media Module defines the interfaces to track video.

context.p: The following task uses the Microsoft Web Developer 2008 Express Edition.

step.cmd: In Visual Web Developer, Click File > New Project.
Select Silverlight Application, then click OK.
Deselect Host the Silverlight application in a new Web site, then click OK.
In the Solution Explorer, right-click References, then select Add Reference.
Select the Browse tab, browse to and select the appropriate AppMeasurement for Silverlight library, then click OK.
